message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be very interested in. I'd like to start with an offer of $12,000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to $10,000.  Is there any flexibility in your price?
I understand you're looking to pay closer to $10,000, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
